name: Situated Consulting
tag_list: consulting, recruiting, technology, software, contracts, employement, hiring, jobs, it
overview:
Situated Consulting is a boutique staffing agency that specializes in identifying and delivering top IT talent, either in a full-time or contract capacity, to a large range of professional industries from coast to coast. Our team of placement consultants has extensive experience in the fields of software, network, and infrastructure engineering and takes pride in their ability to provide a personalized service to each client and candidate. The key to our success has always been in our ability to listen to the needs of our clients and to not only identify individuals who suite the company technically, but are also highly compatible in other areas such as location, compensation, and personality.

Situated Consulting successfully bridges the IT community to your company by means of sophisticated networking tactics, a methodical referral system, and an enormous array of established industry contacts. Our meticulous screening and candidate acceptance process allows us to give clients a smooth and successful experience each time, encouraging them to come back to us for every future hire.
